description.p: An individual_activity is something that happens.
description.note: An activity may be a process of physical change, but need not be. The storage of a batch of material in a tank for a period of time is an activity.

note.p: The act of changing the lubricating oil for pump p_101 on 2001-10-09 is an individual activity.
This individual of activity is a member of the class_of_activity 'change lubricating oil'.

description.note: The entity type Individual_activity defined in this part of ISO 10303 is identical to the entity type activity defined in ISO/DIS 15926-2.
